nodes.text: The Rapid Response Team, or RRT, was a military unit that was used by the Thaereian military on the planet Thaere Privo during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. The unit consisted of an Arrow-23 transport landspeeder and a number of Human troopers. During the Clone Wars, the child Night Wren was kidnapped by the Thaereian military and taken to Thaere Privo. The Heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents from the Cularin system, traveled to the world to rescue her, and they encountered the RRT during the course of their mission.
